name: Cavern (itch) (Juanda)
description:
This game is a reimplementation made with Unity of the game "cavern" from the book "Code the Classics" (https://wireframe.raspberrypi.org/books/code-the-classics1). 

It's a work in progress and I've used it to learn coding videogames with Unity.

The sprites have been designed by Dan Malone and the music by Allister Brimble, two greats names in the videogame word. These assets have been released with a creative common license. On the other hand, all the code have been written by myself.

"Cavern" is a game based on the classic bubble bobble.

Controls:

  • left key -> run left
  • right key -> run right
  • up key -> jump
  • space -> fire

You are free to get the code and change it by cloning https://gitlab.com/juandalibaba/cavern
